name: Garden Harvest
description:
GARDEN HARVEST

It’s Spring and you have entered an ameteur gardening competetition with three of your best friends.

You each have recieved a small patch of land. Show us what you can do by having the largest harvest, and winning the competition!

All RED cards are PLANT SEEDS.

All BLACK cards are HARVEST SEEDS.

Each day, you will choose between PLANTING SEEDS in your garden, or HARVESTING SEEDS from your garden.

After planting seeds of a particular yield, match the value while harvesting seeds for the best yield! Unfortunately, if the plant produces more than you can harvest, it will be considered a loss.

Once the last item has been taken, the season is over. And the judges will look at everyone’s harvests and losses

Whoever has the largest harvest will be celebrated as the best gardener this season.
